sentences.en: A landslip cut the cattle off from the paths before them.
sentences.cn: 一场山崩阻断了牛群的去路.

sentences.en: Because Typhoon Morakot triggered landslip, Siaolin Village was believed that most villagers was missing.
sentences.cn: 因为莫拉克台风造成山崩, 众多小林村村民失踪.

sentences.en: Emergency action was taken by contractors in response to 10 reports on landslip incidents.
sentences.cn: 此外,承建商也因应十宗山泥倾泻报告,采取紧急行动.

sentences.en: Landslip and Flood Warnings were also issued on two and eight occasions respectively.
sentences.cn: 此外,天文台在月内共发出两次山泥倾泻警告和8次水浸警告.

sentences.en: Main geology environmental issues include slope unstableness, geologic and physics influence of landslip, collapse, and debris - flow.
sentences.cn: 主要地质环境问题集中表现在斜坡稳定性差及滑坡 、 崩塌 、 泥石流等物理地质作用明显.

sentences.en: The nonlinear kinetic characters of landslip action are complex, exoteric and dissipated.
sentences.cn: 滑坡行为表现为复杂的 、 开放的和耗散的非线性动力学演化特徵.

trans.tran_en: a small fall of earth or rocks down a hill, cliff etc, that is smaller than a landslide
